title: Penthouse.js Options Critical CSS generator options

keepLargerMediaQueries.title: Do not filter out larger media queries.

propertiesToRemove.title: Convert a color value in hsl notation to hexadecimal notation.

strict.title: Throw on CSS errors (will run faster if no errors)

maxEmbeddedBase64Length.title: Strip out inline base64 encoded resources larger than this

userAgent.title: Specify which user agent string when loading the page

renderWaitTime.title: render wait timeout before CSS processing starts (default: 100)

blockJSRequests.title: set to false to load (external) JS (default: true)
